00044 $page_title = 'Overdued List Report';
00045 $reportView = false;

00047 if (isset($_GET['reportView'])) {
00048     $reportView = true;

00051 if (!$reportView) {
00052 ?>
00053     <!-- filter -->
00054     <fieldset style="margin-bottom: 3px;">

00098 <?php
00099 } else {
00100     ob_start();
00101     // table spec
00102     $table_spec = 'member AS m
00103         LEFT JOIN loan AS l ON m.member_id=l.member_id';
00104 
00105     // create datagrid
00106     $reportgrid = new report_datagrid();
00107     $reportgrid->setSQLColumn('m.member_id AS \''.__('Member ID').'\'');
00108     $reportgrid->setSQLorder('l.due_date DESC');
00109     $reportgrid->sql_group_by = 'm.member_id';
00110 
00111     $overdue_criteria = ' (l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0 AND TO_DAYS(due_date) < TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')) ';
00112     // is there any search
00113     if (isset($_GET['id_name']) AND $_GET['id_name']) {
00114         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['id_name']));
00115         $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00116         if (count($words) > 1) {
00117             $concat_sql = ' (';
00118             foreach ($words as $word) {
00119                 $concat_sql .= " (m.member_id LIKE '%$word%' OR m.member_name LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00120             }
00121             // remove the last AND
00122             $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00123             $concat_sql .= ') ';
00124             $overdue_criteria .= ' AND '.$concat_sql;
00125         } else {
00126             $overdue_criteria .= " AND m.member_id LIKE '%$keyword%' OR m.member_name LIKE '%$keyword%'";
00127         }
00128     }
00129     // loan date
00130     if (isset($_GET['startDate']) AND isset($_GET['untilDate'])) {
00131         $date_criteria = ' AND (TO_DAYS(l.loan_date) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(\''.$_GET['startDate'].'\') AND
00132             TO_DAYS(\''.$_GET['untilDate'].'\'))';
00133         $overdue_criteria .= $date_criteria;
00134     }
00135     if (isset($_GET['recsEachPage'])) {
00136         $recsEachPage = (integer)$_GET['recsEachPage'];
00137         $num_recs_show = ($recsEachPage >= 5 && $recsEachPage <= 200)?$recsEachPage:$num_recs_show;
00138     }
00139     $reportgrid->setSQLCriteria($overdue_criteria);
00140 
00141     // set table and table header attributes
00142     $reportgrid->table_attr = 'align="center" class="dataListPrinted" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00143     $reportgrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeaderPrinted"';
00144     $reportgrid->column_width = array('1' => '80%');
00145 
00146     // callback function to show overdued list
00147     function showOverduedList($obj_db, $array_data)
00148     {
00149         global $date_criteria;
00150 
00151         // member name
00152         $member_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT member_name, member_email, member_phone FROM member WHERE member_id=\''.$array_data[0].'\'');
00153         $member_d = $member_q->fetch_row();
00154         $member_name = $member_d[0];
00155         unset($member_q);
00156 
00157         $ovd_title_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT l.item_code, i.price, i.price_currency,
00158             b.title, l.loan_date,
00159             l.due_date, (TO_DAYS(DATE(NOW()))-TO_DAYS(due_date)) AS \'Overdue Days\'
00160             FROM loan AS l
00161                 LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00162                 LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00163             WHERE (l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0 AND TO_DAYS(due_date) < TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')) AND l.member_id=\''.$array_data[0].'\''.( !empty($date_criteria)?$date_criteria:'' ));
00164         $_buffer = '<div style="font-weight: bold; color: black; font-size: 10pt; margin-bottom: 3px;">'.$member_name.' ('.$array_data[0].')</div>';
00165         $_buffer .= '<div style="font-size: 10pt; margin-bottom: 3px;">'.__('E-mail').': <a href="mailto:'.$member_d[1].'">'.$member_d[1].'</a> - '.__('Phone Number').': '.$member_d[2].'</div>';
00166         $_buffer .= '<table width="100%" cellspacing="0">';
00167         while ($ovd_title_d = $ovd_title_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00168             $_buffer .= '<tr>';
00169             $_buffer .= '<td valign="top" width="10%">'.$ovd_title_d['item_code'].'</td>';
00170             $_buffer .= '<td valign="top" width="40%">'.$ovd_title_d['title'].'<div>'.__('Price').': '.$ovd_title_d['price'].' '.$ovd_title_d['price_currency'].'</div></td>';
00171             $_buffer .= '<td width="20%">'.__('Overdue').': '.$ovd_title_d['Overdue Days'].' '.__('day(s)').'</td>';
00172             $_buffer .= '<td width="30%">'.__('Loan Date').': '.$ovd_title_d['loan_date'].' &nbsp; '.__('Due Date').': '.$ovd_title_d['due_date'].'</td>';
00173             $_buffer .= '</tr>';
00174         }
00175         $_buffer .= '</table>';
00176         return $_buffer;
00177     }
00178     // modify column value
00179     $reportgrid->modifyColumnContent(0, 'callback{showOverduedList}');
00180 
00181     // put the result into variables
00182     echo $reportgrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, $num_recs_show);
00183 
00184     echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00185     echo 'parent.$(\'pagingBox\').update(\''.str_replace(array("\n", "\r", "\t"), '', $reportgrid->paging_set).'\');'."\n";
00186     echo '</script>';
00187 
00188     $content = ob_get_clean();
00189     // include the page template
00190     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/printed_page_tpl.php';
00191 }
